content: {"locationId": "6318", "organizationId": "5355", "name": "Bridge to Hope", "address1": "10844 SW 188th St", "address2": "", "city": "Cutler Bay", "state": "FL", "zipCode": "33157", "country": null, "phone": "786-269-1608", "phoneExt": "", "website": "", "latitude": "25.5928578", "longitude": "-80.3668269", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "", "features": "Near Public Transit", "aboutUs": "1. Mission Statement: Bridge to Hope provides holistic programs designed to bridge the gap to self-sufficiency for low-income and in-crisis families, to raise their quality of life and standard of living, and to restore dignity and hope to those in need. By providing a food pantry, community kitchen, clothing, basic household necessities, school supplies, health screenings, job skills training and much more, we empower families and strengthen communities.  2. Vision: Our vision is to strengthen our community through supports that increase opportunity, social justice, and equity. By serving as a one stop resource center providing basic needs while offering skills-based programs, we empower our clients to attain their dream of self-sufficiency and a better life. We provide a comprehensive set of quality programs with targeted individual assistance and a personal touch, which foster effective, lasting, and positive impact. Bridge to Hope is an equal opportunity provider, offering tangible help and hope in an atmosphere that respects and dignifies all clients, volunteers, and staff members", "notes": "Assistance is available by appointment only. Please feel free to contact us to schedule a convenient time.  ", "contactName": "Bridge to Hope client contact", "contactPhone": "786-269-1608", "contactEmail": "", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "Reservations", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 45, "regionName": "Feeding South Florida", "logoBlobNameSmall": "f8218402-042e-413d-9a89-cf1c54cb9c30.png", "website": "https://feedingsouthflorida.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Eastern Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "ET", "offsetHours": "-4", "schedules": ["Tuesday 9:30 AM-12:00 PM (By appointment ONLY)", "Thursday 9:30 AM-12:00 PM (By appointment ONLY)", "Saturday 9:30 AM-12:00 PM (By appointment ONLY)"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
